alert.note: Alert for Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 3:30AM CDT until April 26 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR STEPHENS COUNTY... At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hubbard Creek Reservoir, or near Breckenridge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Daniel, Necessity, Crystal Falls, Caddo, Possum Kingdom State Park, Possum Kingdom Lake, Eolian, Ivan and Us-180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
